layout.name: projectileID
layout.title: Projectile
layout.tooltip: Which NPC to fire from the blaster (use none to fire regular Bullet Bills).

layout.name: baseLength
layout.title: Base Length
layout.tooltip: How tall, in blocks, the base of the NPC is.

layout.name: delay
layout.title: Delay
layout.tooltip: The number of ticks between attempts to fire the Bill Blaster.

layout.name: maximumShots
layout.title: Maximum Shots
layout.tooltip: How many shots the NPC can make before it will stop shooting. This will not reset when despawning. Use 0 to make it never stop.

layout.name: useLocalTimer
layout.title: Use Local Timer
layout.tooltip: If checked, will use its own timer rather than a global one.
